org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram.tools.standard

Class GenericLinkTool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram.tools.DefaultDiagramTool
      • org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram.tools.DefaultLinkTool
        • org.modelio.api.modelio.diagram.tools.standard.GenericLinkTool
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDiagramTool, ILinkTool

    public class GenericLinkTool
extends DefaultLinkTool
    Generic diagram link creation tool.

    • Method Detail

      • acceptFirstElement

        public boolean acceptFirstElement(IDiagramHandle diagramHandle,
                                  IDiagramGraphic targetNode)
        Description copied from class: DefaultLinkTool
        This method accept or refuse the interaction in the diagram for the origin of the link.

        This method is called until the user clicks on an element.
        This default implementation always accept the interaction.

        Specified by:
        acceptFirstElement in interface ILinkTool
        Specified by:
        acceptFirstElement in class DefaultLinkTool
        Parameters:
        diagramHandle - the representation of the diagram in which the interaction occurs.
        targetNode - the graphic that is below the mouse pointer.
        Returns:
        an boolean that represents the result of the acceptFirstElement method.

      • acceptSecondElement

        public boolean acceptSecondElement(IDiagramHandle diagramHandle,
                                   IDiagramGraphic originNode,
                                   IDiagramGraphic targetNode)
        Description copied from class: DefaultLinkTool
        This method accept or refuse the interaction with the diagram for the destination element of the link.

        This method is called after the user has choosen the origin of the link.
        This default implementation always accept the interaction.

        Specified by:
        acceptSecondElement in interface ILinkTool
        Specified by:
        acceptSecondElement in class DefaultLinkTool
        Parameters:
        diagramHandle - the representation of the diagram in which the interaction occurs.
        originNode - the graphic that is the origin of the link.
        targetNode - the graphic the is below the mouse pointer.
        Returns:
        an boolean that represents the result of the acceptSecondElement method.

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(IDiagramHandle diagramHandle,
                            IDiagramGraphic originNode,
                            IDiagramGraphic targetNode,
                            IDiagramLink.LinkRouterKind routerType,
                            ILinkRoute path)
        Description copied from class: DefaultLinkTool
        This method is invoked when the command is launched.

        The actionPerformed is called after user has choosen the destination of the link.
        This default implementation does nothing.

        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface ILinkTool
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in class DefaultLinkTool
        Parameters:
        diagramHandle - the representation of the diagram where the command has been triggered.
        originNode - the origin graphic of the link to create.
        targetNode - the destination graphic of the link to create.
        routerType - the router type that is currently defined to compute the path of the link.
        path - the link path deduced from the user interactions.
        See Also:
        IDiagramHandle.unmask(MObject, int, int)

      • postConfigure

        protected void postConfigure(IDiagramHandle diagramHandle,
                             IDiagramGraphic originNode,
                             IDiagramGraphic targetNode,
                             ModelElement source,
                             ModelElement target,
                             MObject newElement,
                             IDiagramLink newLink,
                             java.util.List<IDiagramGraphic> newGraphics,
                             IDiagramLink.LinkRouterKind routerType,
                             ILinkRoute path)
        Hook called once the element is created, configured, unmasked and before the transaction is committed.

        Does nothing by default. Sub classes may redefine this method to make additional modifications.

        Parameters:
        diagramHandle - the diagram handle
        originNode - the source graphic node
        targetNode - the target graphic node
        source - the source model element
        target - the target model element
        newElement - the created link element
        newLink - the unmasked link graphic
        newGraphics - the graphics relating the new element that were unmasked. The first in this list is 'newLink'.
        routerType - the router type that is currently defined to compute the path of the link.
        path - the link path deduced from the user interactions.
